mapper.select: select * from multimusic where music_emotion=#{image_emotion} and music_age=#{image_age} and music_gender=#{image_gender}
mapper.insert: insert into multihistory(image_name, music_num, member_email) values( #{image_name}, #{music_num}, #{member_email});
mapper.select: select * from multimusic where music_emotion=#{image_emotion} and music_age=#{image_age} and music_gender=#{image_gender}
